H0.text: Which type of lens is thicker at the centre than at the edge, as used in microscopes. Convex

H1.text: Which type of lens is thicker at the centre than at the edge, as used in microscopes. Meniscus

H2.text: Which type of lens is thicker at the centre than at the edge, as used in microscopes. Plano-Convex

H3.text: Which type of lens is thicker at the centre than at the edge, as used in microscopes. Biconcave

A4.text: the lens is much thicker than the radius of curvature
